A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly plotted and paced. All the new and some of the old characters are throwaways. Characterizations are inconsistent. There is an entire subplot that could be removed from TLJ\, and no one would miss it. The character development in The Force Awakens that made it more than just fan service is mostly absent here. There is nothing memorable about this movie other than a few visuals...not the story\, characters or even the new music themes. I gave it 2.5 stars\, and if it wasn't Star Wars I would have scored it even lower.
